AEROVUE FOR KING AIR B200: EASA STC RECEIVED Breaking news! Contact your local Area Sales Manager <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]> for details.
AEROVUE TOUCH PANEL Upgrading can be a daunting task, from pricing to compatibility, features sets and subscriptions. AeroNav <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeronav-gps-navigators]]> touch GPS navigators, AeroVue Touch <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerovue-touch]]> displays and our affordable lines of autopilots such as the AeroCruze 100 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-100]]> and AeroCruze 230 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-230]]> touchscreen provide options and configurations to fit every retrofit budget imaginable. Add the AeroFlight <[[https://bkx.bendixking.com/en/products/aeroflight/]]> backup attitude indicator, AeroPoint engine data monitoring, and AeroPower <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeropower-usb-charging-device]]> USB outlets for maximum information in a minimal amount of space. VIDEO REVIEW HERE >> <[[https://youtu.be/xPBRd-8jn04]]>
AEROCRUZE 230 AUTOPILOT KFC 150 slide-in upgrades are available through the full 3-axis touchscreen AeroCruze 230 autopilot. Installation costs are kept minimal using existing servos and wiring, and reduces downtime from 3 weeks to 1 week. This autopilot includes a lengthy list of standard features such as altitude pre-select/alerter and automatic wing leveler function, and interfaces with many legacy BendixKing sensors. Find your Aerostar, Beechcraft, Cessna, Mooney, Piper, Socata model on our AML STC. FIND OUT MORE >> <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-230]]>

AEROCORDER 100 FLIGHT DATA / COCKPIT VOICE RECORDER AeroCorder 100 offers a rugged enclosure, small size, lower weight, and less power consumption than traditional FDRs in a modular and flexible architecture. The additional acquisition module converts the AeroCorder into a Data Acquisition and Crash Recorder System, making this ideal for FOQA and SMS data collection. Designed and spec’d for airborne operational commercial and military environments for fixed-wing and rotary aircraft. PRODUCT PAGE >> <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocorder-fdr-cvr]]>
EXPERIMENTAL AIRCRAFT UPGRADES xVue Touch, xCruze autopilots, and xPoint are ready for your panel. xVue Touch <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/xvue-touch]]> includes free software upgrades, all flight indicators synthetic vision with terrain, ADS-B in, weather, traffic and more. The display also integrates seamlessly with popular navigators! xCruze <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/xcruze-100]]> 100 and 110 autopilots can be purchased directly online and come standard with an extensive feature set. And for engine data monitoring, the xPoint <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/xpoint-100]]> 100 provides a low-cost base price, with your choice of options. Joe Coraggio, Reno Air Racer, professional pilot, builder and engineer, talks about his experience flying his Lancair Legacy with these products. WATCH HIS STORY >> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/customer-success-stories/2019/07/upgraded-flight-panel-gives-race-pilot-an-edge]]>
CUSTOMER SUCCESS STORY: VENTURA AIR When customers started requesting Wi-Fi on charters, the family behind Ventura Air Services couldn’t find a cost-effective solution until they discovered AeroWave <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerowave-100]]>. For a radically low price with competitive hourly access rates and voice plans, this comprehensive satellite solution gives passengers and crew unlimited access to text, email, web, and phone, even over water. READ THEIR STORY >> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/customer-success-stories/2019/02/aerowave-wifi-helps-ventura-air-customers-feel-like-family]]>
Need a deeper dive into connectivity and AeroWave? Download our paper “The State of Connectivity in General Aviation”. STATE OF CONNECTIVITY IN GA >> <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Aerowave-100.html]]>
